label: 高丘相好
本: The Pursuit of Loneliness: Chinese and Japanese Nature Poetry in Medieval Japan, ca. 1050-1150 . Franz Steiner Verlag Stuttgart . 1995
説明文: (dates unknown, active second half tenth century). Teacher of Fujiwara no Kintō. Kanshi in Ruijū kudaishō, Wakan rōeishū 和漢朗詠集(5), Shinsen rōeishū 新撰朗詠集 (2), and Wakan kensakushū (2). Preface in Honchō monzui. [藤原公任、漢詩、和漢兼作集、本朝文粋]
